title: Four people shot in Lea County
content:
The shooting happened at about 10:22 p.m. in the 2000 block of North Bensing Road near Hobbs, the release stated. The injured people identified by deputies are 29-year-old Karen Teel, 24-year-old Jerry Teel, 23-year-old Omar Gutierrez and 18-year-old Joe David Delao.
All were taken to Lea County Regional Medical Center, the release stated. From there, Karen Teel, Gutierrez and Delao would be flown to University Medical Center in Lubbock.
Karen Teel, the release stated, suffered gunshot wounds to his cheek, neck and arm; Gutierrez suffered a gunshot wound to his right hand; and Delao suffered a gunshot wound to his lower back. Jerry Teel was treated for a gunshot graze to his head and released in Lea County.
The sheriff’s office released no information about the investigation except that deputies served a search warrant early Wednesday in the 6900 block of North Country Road that yielded four people who might know about the shooting or be somehow connected.
